title: Stroke Patient and Family Care Education Program Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary medical knowledge and general understanding of instructional design
context.additional_context: Educational design project utilizing Collaborative Inquiry (CI) and the ADDIE model in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: A learner analysis tool for stroke patient and family caregiver education can be designed and applied.
Educational program design requirements can be derived using the Collaborative Inquiry (CI) methodology.
Four units of educational content can be developed according to the analysis-design-development phases of the ADDIE model.
Develop educational materials compatible with limited technological environments (smartphone-friendly PDFs/videos)
Conduct project-based assessments to create peer feedback and reflective journals

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
